nodes.text: Baron Benton Kaldo was a male Human businessman and crime lord during the Galactic Civil War. Able to trace his his lineage to Corellian nobility, Kaldo's wealth originated from his family's ancestral business success. He used that wealth to establish a syndicate that operated both legitimate enterprises as well as control over the majority of criminal activity on Centerpoint Station, becoming a billionaire in the process. Kaldo enjoyed the benefits of his success, wearing only the finest clothing and the left the day-to-day operation of his business ventures to his Drall majordomo, Gustip.
